Definition.WordDefinition: bodacious adj 1: incorrigible; "a bodacious gossip" 2: unrestrained by convention or propriety; "an audacious trick to pull"; "a barefaced hypocrite"; "the most bodacious display of tourism this side of Anaheim"- Los Angeles Times; "bold-faced lies"; "brazen arrogance"; "the modern world with its quick material successes and insolent belief in the boundless possibilities of progress"- Bertrand Russell [syn: {audacious}, {barefaced}, {bold-faced}, {brassy}, {brazen}, {brazen-faced}, {insolent}]
